attributes.action: Fines on company's who do not reduce their co2 emission
attributes.additional_details: With CO2 emissions ever increasing big multinational company's cannot be trusted to keep down their emissions, they're just contributing to the high  CO2 levels in the atmosphere that is slowly warming the earth. Heavy fines should be imposed on company's that do reduce their emissions and harmful chemicals that they realise by at least 50% to help sustain our earth.
